products.title: iPhone 14 Pro
products.description: The iPhone 14 Pro features an A16 Bionic chip, a 48MP triple camera system, and a stunning Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion.

reviews.comment: Incredible performance and amazing camera quality!
Dynamic Island is really cool. Feels premium.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra
products.description: Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra comes with a 200MP camera, Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 processor, and a large 6.8-inch AMOLED display.

reviews.comment: The best Android phone you can buy.
Battery life and camera zoom are amazing!

products.title: OnePlus 12
products.description: OnePlus 12 comes with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, a 120Hz AMOLED display, and Hasselblad-tuned cameras for stunning photography.

reviews.comment: Camera is way better than before.

products.title: Google Pixel 8 Pro
products.description: Google Pixel 8 Pro features the Google Tensor G3 chip, pro-level cameras, and AI-powered photo and video tools.

reviews.comment: Clean Android experience with smart AI tools.

products.title: Xiaomi 14 Pro
products.description: Xiaomi 14 Pro comes with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3, Leica-tuned cameras, and a 120W fast-charging 4880mAh battery.

reviews.comment: Leica camera gives stunning colors and detail.

products.title: Nothing Phone (2)
products.description: Nothing Phone (2) brings a unique transparent design, Snapdragon 8+ Gen 1 performance, and an innovative Glyph Interface for notifications.

reviews.comment: Love the design and the Glyph lights are so cool!
Smooth UI and unique look, definitely stands out.

products.title: MacBook Air M2
products.description: The MacBook Air M2 redefines power and portability with Apple’s next-gen M2 chip and a stunning 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display.

reviews.comment: Super light and fast — perfect for daily use.

products.title: HP Victus Gaming Laptop
products.description: The HP Victus is a performance-packed gaming laptop with a Ryzen 5 processor and NVIDIA RTX graphics for serious gamers.

reviews.comment: Great performance at this price point!
Runs games smoothly with minimal heat.

products.title: Dell XPS 13 Plus
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 Plus delivers exceptional performance with 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processors and an ultra-thin, sleek design.

products.title: HP Spectre x360
products.description: The HP Spectre x360 offers a 2-in-1 convertible design, OLED display, and 13th Gen Intel performance in a premium aluminum body.

reviews.comment: Great convertible laptop for work and entertainment.

products.title: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14
products.description: The ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14 is a compact gaming powerhouse with Ryzen 9, RTX 4070 GPU, and QHD+ 165Hz display.

reviews.comment: Love the design and keyboard feel.

products.title: Lenovo Yoga 9i Gen 8
products.description: The Lenovo Yoga 9i combines premium design with flexible 2-in-1 usability, featuring Intel Evo certification and a 4K OLED touchscreen.

reviews.comment: The rotating soundbar is a cool touch!

products.title: Apple Watch Series 9
products.description: Track your fitness, monitor your heart rate, and stay connected with the Apple Watch Series 9 featuring an always-on Retina display.

reviews.comment: Perfect for workouts and daily tracking.

products.title: Noise ColorFit Pro 4
products.description: Noise ColorFit Pro 4 offers a large display, customizable watch faces, and all-day SpO2 and heart rate monitoring.

specs.Features: Heart rate, SpO2, Sleep Tracking

products.title: Casio F91W Digital Watch
products.description: Classic digital watch with alarm, stopwatch, and water resistance up to 50 meters.

specs.Features: Alarm, Stopwatch, Backlight

products.title: Fossil Grant Chronograph
products.description: Elegant analogue chronograph with Roman numerals and stainless steel case.

specs.Features: Chronograph, Water Resistant 50m

products.title: Apple Watch Series 9
products.description: Smartwatch with advanced health sensors, Retina display, and Siri integration.

specs.Features: ECG, Blood Oxygen, Fitness Tracking, Siri

products.title: Garmin Instinct 2 Solar
products.description: Rugged GPS smartwatch with solar charging and built-in multi-sport tracking.

specs.Features: Heart Rate, GPS, Solar Charging, Altimeter

reviews.comment: Perfect for hiking and outdoor sports.
Battery life is insane with solar charging!

products.title: Seiko 5 Sports Automatic
products.description: Automatic mechanical watch with 24-jewel movement and stainless steel bracelet.

specs.Features: Self-Winding, Day-Date Display, 100m Water Resistance

reviews.comment: Smooth sweep second hand, true classic.
Feels luxurious without breaking the bank.

products.title: TAG Heuer Aquaracer Professional 300
products.description: Swiss luxury diving watch with ceramic bezel and automatic Calibre 5 movement.

specs.Features: 300m Water Resistance, Luminous Markers, Screw-down Crown

products.title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 6 Classic
products.description: Smartwatch with rotating bezel, fitness tracking, and seamless Android integration.

specs.Features: Sleep Tracking, ECG, GPS, Rotating Bezel

products.title: Timex Ironman Classic 30
products.description: Durable sports digital watch with lap timer and 100-meter water resistance.

specs.Features: Chronograph, Timer, Indiglo Light, Alarm

products.title: Huawei Watch Fit 2
products.description: Stylish fitness smartwatch with AMOLED display and advanced workout modes.

specs.Features: Heart Rate, SpO2, Sleep Tracking, GPS

products.title: Tissot PRX Powermatic 80
products.description: Swiss automatic watch with 80-hour power reserve and stainless steel integrated bracelet.

specs.Features: Sapphire Crystal, Date Display, Swiss Made

reviews.comment: Feels like a luxury Genta-inspired piece.

products.title: Sony WH-1000XM5
products.description: Industry-leading noise cancellation with Sony’s WH-1000XM5 wireless headphones featuring up to 30 hours of battery life.

specs.Features: ANC, Touch Control, Quick Charge

products.title: Boat Rockerz 450
products.description: Boat Rockerz 450 offers deep bass, comfortable ear cushions, and up to 15 hours of playback.

specs.Features: Lightweight, Deep Bass, Voice Assistant

reviews.comment: Great sound at a budget price.

products.title: Canon EOS 1500D
products.description: The Canon EOS 1500D is an entry-level DSLR with a 24.1MP APS-C sensor, built-in Wi-Fi, and full HD recording.

reviews.comment: Sharp image quality and easy controls.

products.title: GoPro Hero 12 Black
products.description: GoPro Hero 12 Black delivers 5.3K video, HyperSmooth stabilization, and waterproof durability up to 10m.

products.title: Sony Alpha ZV-E10
products.description: Sony Alpha ZV-E10 is a compact mirrorless camera designed for vloggers with 4K video and real-time tracking.

reviews.comment: Compact and super crisp image quality.

products.title: Fujifilm Instax Mini 12
products.description: Fun and easy-to-use instant camera that prints photos instantly with a built-in flash and selfie mirror.

specs.Features: Instant Print, Selfie Mode, Flash

reviews.comment: Great for parties and instant memories!
Cute design and easy to use.

products.title: Nikon Coolpix B600
products.description: Compact superzoom camera with 60x optical zoom and Full HD video recording.

reviews.comment: Excellent zoom range for travel shots.

products.title: DJI Osmo Pocket 3
products.description: Compact handheld 3-axis gimbal camera with 4K120 video and face tracking — perfect for cinematic footage.

reviews.comment: Perfect for travel and content creators.

products.title: IMOU 2K 360° Outdoor WiFi Security Camera
products.description: IMOU 2K 360° outdoor WiFi camera with full-pan and tilt, smart tracking, colour night vision and two-way audio – ideal for home external monitoring.

specs.Features: Smart tracking, Two-Way Audio, Colour Night Vision

reviews.comment: Covers entire yard with one camera – very handy.
Good value for the price and the 2K image is clear.

products.title: TP-Link Tapo C210 3MP Pan/Tilt Home Security WiFi Camera
products.description: TP-Link Tapo C210 is an indoor pan/tilt WiFi camera with 3MP resolution, 360° horizontal rotation, night vision and micro-SD card support – perfect for baby rooms or indoor surveillance.

specs.Features: Pan/Tilt Control, Night Vision, MicroSD Storage

reviews.comment: Great for checking in on my toddler while I work.
Simple to install, app works smoothly.

products.title: CP PLUS Smart CCTV Security Camera (Outdoor Bullet)
products.description: CP PLUS Smart CCTV outdoor bullet camera with weather-proof housing, IR night vision and WiFi/Bluetooth connectivity – designed for perimeter monitoring.

specs.Features: IR Night Vision, Motion Alerts, Outdoor Use

reviews.comment: Mounted it on my exterior wall – works through rain fine.
Good image clarity for the price.

products.title: Apple iPad Pro M4
products.description: The iPad Pro M4 is a powerhouse tablet with Apple's latest M4 chip, Liquid Retina XDR display, and Apple Pencil Pro support.

reviews.comment: Blazing fast performance for creative work.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
products.description: A massive 14.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED display with S Pen support, perfect for productivity and entertainment.

reviews.comment: Best Android tablet experience hands down.

products.title: Sony WH-1000XM5
products.description: Industry-leading wireless headphones with adaptive noise cancellation, crystal-clear calls, and 30-hour battery life.

specs.Features: Noise Cancelling, Touch Controls, Alexa/Google Assistant

reviews.comment: Unmatched noise cancellation and sound quality.

products.title: JBL C100SI
products.description: Lightweight wired earphones with JBL Pure Bass sound and in-line mic for hands-free calls.

specs.Features: Mic, Deep Bass, Lightweight

reviews.comment: Best sound in this price range.
Compact and works perfectly with my phone.

products.title: boAt Rockerz 255 Pro+
products.description: Wireless Bluetooth neckband with ASAP charge, 40 hours of playback, and IPX7 water resistance.

specs.Features: Fast Charging, Water Resistant, Voice Assistant Support

reviews.comment: Fits well and great for workouts.

products.title: Apple AirPods Pro (2nd Generation)
products.description: Premium TWS earbuds with adaptive transparency, active noise cancellation, and spatial audio with dynamic head tracking.

specs.Features: ANC, Spatial Audio, Siri, IPX4

reviews.comment: Crystal clear sound and deep bass.

products.title: HyperX Cloud II
products.description: Gaming headset with 7.1 virtual surround sound, memory foam ear cushions, and detachable noise-cancelling mic.

reviews.comment: Best headset for long gaming sessions.

products.title: Sennheiser HD 280 Pro
products.description: Closed-back studio headphones with accurate sound reproduction and excellent passive noise isolation.

specs.Features: Studio Monitoring, Foldable Design, High Noise Isolation

products.title: OnePlus Bullets Wireless Z2
products.description: Wireless earphones with massive 30-hour battery, fast charging, and deep bass drivers.

specs.Features: Fast Charging, IP55 Water Resistance, Voice Assistant

reviews.comment: Charges super fast and lasts days!

products.title: Bose QuietComfort Ultra Earbuds
products.description: Premium ANC earbuds with immersive audio, customizable EQ, and long-lasting comfort for travel and daily use.

specs.Features: Active Noise Cancelling, Custom EQ, IPX4

reviews.comment: Feels luxurious and sounds even better.

products.title: Logitech G Pro X Wireless Lightspeed
products.description: Wireless gaming headset with Blue VO!CE microphone technology and DTS Headphone:X 2.0 surround sound.
